title: A Vision Of Schooling That’s Both Tech-Savvy And Values-Driven - Forbes
content: A Vision Of Schooling That’s Both Tech-Savvy And Values-Driven  Forbes
description: In an education sector that tends to swing between unbridled techno-optimism and unhinged technophobia, Marina Umaschi Bers’s new book, Beyond Coding: How Children Learn Human Values Through Programming, is a welcome change.
